parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post contains a CMF number (11240060) at the end. This strongly suggests electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are used for identifying candidates and are mandated for electoral materials.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly refers to Florin Barbur, a candidate for the Chamber of Deputies for the REPER party, by name and image.  It also clearly states his position on the ballot (position 10). This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, targeting a wide audience in Maramureș County, Romania.  The use of hashtags and a call to action ("Voteaz\u0103 cu \u00eencredere! Voteaz\u0103 informat! Voteaz\u0103 responsabil!") further indicates an attempt to reach a broad public. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters in Maramureș County to vote for Florin Barbur (position 10) in the parliamentary elections. The post highlights his political platform and explicitly calls for votes. This clearly fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic. While it mentions policy points, it lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic reporting. The clear call to action and focus on a specific candidate disqualifies it from being considered journalistic in nature.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a structured presentation of a candidate's platform designed to persuade voters. The use of professional photography and a paid advertisement format further reinforces this.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>862108969407622</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, Art 36 (7). It refers to a specific candidate (Florin Barbur), uses his image, promotes his candidacy, targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and aims to influence the vote. The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion. The post's content is not journalistic or a personal opinion; it's a clear attempt to promote a candidate's electoral campaign.  The end date of the advertisement (1732953600) corresponds to November 23rd, 2024, after the official end of the electoral campaign period.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>FLORIN BARBUR</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>REPER</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Atelierul de internet SRL, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei reclame plătite pe Facebook (ID postare: 862108969407622), care promovează candidatura lui FLORIN BARBUR pentru Camera Deputaților din partea partidului REPER, prezentând imaginea acestuia și îndemnând la vot cu fraze precum „Votează cu încredere! Votează informat! Votează responsabil!”, având ca efect electoral influențarea pozitivă a voturilor pentru candidatul menționat.  Reclama, care a avut o estimare a vizualizărilor între 8.000 și 9.000 și o estimare a audienței de 100.000 - 500.000 de persoane, conține numărul CMF 11240060, specific materialelor electorale, și a costat între 100 și 199 RON.  Această acțiune constituie propagandă electorală după încheierea perioadei legale, fiind interzisă conform articolului 98 t).  Datele de contact ale Atelierul de internet SRL sunt: andrei@atelieru.ro și +40755080070.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
